dcterms:creator: A. Lai
J. Tetreault
dcterms:description: The Grammarly Corpus of Discourse Coherence (GCDC) contains texts from four domains, including Yahoo online forum posts, emails from Hillary Clinton’s office, emails from Enron, and Yelp online business reviews. It is annotated by expert raters with a coherence score ∈ {1, 2, 3}, representing low, medium, and high levels of coherence, respectively.
dcterms:title: Grammarly Corpus of Discourse Coherence (GCDC)

dcterms:creator: D. Blanchard
J. Tetreault
D. Higgins
A. Cahill
M. Chodorow
dcterms:description: The Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL) dataset contains essays from eight prompts along with score levels (low/medium/high) for each essay. It has been used to evaluate coherence models.
dcterms:title: Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL)
